job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtexperience needed yearsltpgtltpgtits an in office position south indianapolis indiana area relocation is required starting salaries is negotiable were willing train up if necessary our tech stack is react node python postgresql ampamp react nativeltpgtltpgtyou would be working on database intake systems improving query performance ampamp building charts various user interfaces for clients ampamp staff to interact with our weather data other work may include rebuilding our legacy website upgrading maintaining our application ampamp building up our api ampamp more this is a full stack position you may be required to learn languages ampamp tools you have never used before this is an on call position if a bug comes up you must be available to drop everything ampamp fix it if necessaryltpgt
